Class AbandonedShipState_2

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.AbandonedShipCard.AbandonedShipState
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.AbandonedShipCard.AbandonedShipState_2
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AbandonedShipState_2 extends AbandonedShipState implements Serializable
Second state of the AbandonedShipCard effect logic. In this state, the current player must remove a specific number of crew members from cabin tiles. After all required removals, the player receives cosmic credits and the game proceeds to the next turn.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • activateEffect

      public void activateEffect(InputCommand inputCommand)
      Activates the effect for this state. The player must select a cabin tile from which a crew member is removed. After all required removals:
      • The player receives cosmic credits
      • The game resets the current card and updates the game state
      Specified by:
      activateEffect in class AbandonedShipState
      Parameters:
      inputCommand - the coordinates of the selected tile
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the selected tile is not a cabin or is invalid

      Returns:

    • getMembersStillToRemove

      public int getMembersStillToRemove()
      Returns the number of crew members still to be removed.
      Returns:
      the remaining number of crew members to remove
